basics.name: Filipe Teixeira Amaral
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer
basics.summary:
Full-Stack Engineer with nearly a decade of experience building SaaS platforms in healthcare, fintech, and insurance. End-to-end product delivery—GraphQL APIs, compliance systems, React frontends, and data pipelines.

Tech: Python, TypeScript, Django, FastAPI, NestJS, React, Next.js, GraphQL, PostgreSQL, DynamoDB, AWS, Terraform

work.name: DrChrono
highlights: Led ONC HTI-1 and USCDI v3 certification compliance for 15+ clinical resource types
Built Care Plan module end-to-end: GraphQL schema, React frontend, care team management
Developed SMART on FHIR integration platform with JWT authentication

work.name: DevStride
highlights: Building wealth management platform: NestJS, Next.js, TypeScript, Turborepo

work.name: Surton
highlights: Built FastAPI pharmaceutical pricing platform with multi-vendor integrations

work.name: Tomorrow Health
highlights: Built Prior Authorization system: Django GraphQL backend + React frontend

work.name: BriteCore
highlights: Modernized insurance platform for 50+ companies: Python, Django, VueJS, AWS

education.institution: Universidade Federal de São João del-Rei
